content.rendered:
Catering Services

  • CONFERENCE MANAGEMENT
  • CORPORATE TOURS
  • AWARD FUNCTIONS
  • DEALERS MEET
  • PRODUCT LAUNCH
  • EXHIBITIONS STALL DESIGNING
  • ANNUAL CELEBRATIONS / FUNCTIONS

  • PSPRESS CONFERENCES
  • TRADE SHOW MANAGEMENT
  • CORPORATE TRAINING PROGRAMS
  • FACTORY / BRANCH / REAL ESTATE
  • PROJECT INAUGURATIONS
  • AGM’S & MANY MORE…
